text: @JNJNews @UConn In no way is racism ANY kind of disease. You should lose your license to practice since you can't make that distinction.  It's an insult to those who suffered REAL bigotry AND to victims of #coronavirus to link them. JJ talcum powder losers, go ahead create a vaccine for racism!
